data.name: Elite: Shadowlands Season 4
data.desc: Earn the rank of Elite during Shadowlands Season 4.

data.name: The Joy of Toy
data.desc: Collect 500 toys.

data.name: Dragonflight Dungeon Hero
data.desc: Complete the Dragonflight Heroic dungeon achievements listed below.

subtree.name: Heroic: Algeth'ar Academy
subtree.desc: Defeat the Echo of Doragosa in Algeth'ar Academy on Heroic difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Heroic: Brackenhide Hollow
subtree.desc: Defeat Decatriarch Wratheye in Brackenhide Hollow on Heroic difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Heroic: Halls of Infusion
subtree.desc: Defeat the Primal Tsunami in Halls of Infusion on Heroic difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Heroic: Ruby Life Pools
subtree.desc: Defeat Kyrakka and Erkhart Stormvein in Ruby Life Pools on Heroic difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Heroic: The Nokhud Offensive
subtree.desc: Defeat Balakar Khan in The Nokhud Offensive on Heroic difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Heroic: Uldaman: Legacy of Tyr
subtree.desc: Defeat Chrono-Lord Deios in Uldaman: Legacy of Tyr on Heroic difficulty or higher.

data.name: Glory of the Dragonflight Hero
data.desc: Complete the Dragonflight Mythic dungeon achievements listed below.

subtree.name: See Me After Class
subtree.desc: Defeat Vexamus without players absorbing any Arcane Orbs in Algeth'ar Academy on Mythic Difficulty.

subtree.name: Duck, Duck, Spruce!
subtree.desc: Defeat the Overgrown Ancient while all party members have a Well-Fed Duckling on their head in Algeth'ar Academy on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Duckling on all party members during combat

subtree.name: Squad Goals
subtree.desc: Defeat Crawth after simultaneously activating both Goals in Algeth'ar Academy on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Activate both Goals at the same time

subtree.name: Growlbossify
subtree.desc: Defeat Hackclaw's War-Band after freeing Chief Softpaw, equipping her with a spear and shield, and making sure she survives in Brackenhide Hollow on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Free Chief Softpaw, equip her with a spear and shield, keep her alive

subtree.name: All Bark, All Bite
subtree.desc: Defeat Treemouth after every player has been consumed at least once in Brackenhide Hollow on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: So You Can Kill This in a Way That Matters...
criteria.achievement_name: So You Can Kill This in a Way That Matters...

subtree.name: So You Can Kill This in a Way That Matters...
subtree.desc: Defeat Decatriarch Wratheye after finding and planting three Resilient Mushrooms, then destroying them with Decaystrike in Brackenhide Hollow on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: Toxicity Strike Team
subtree.desc: Defeat the Toxic Swogmother after Purging the Water Intakes in Halls of Infusion on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: Hungry Hungry Hornswog
subtree.desc: Defeat the Gulping Goliath after forcing it to become Hangry and devour 10 Curious Swoglets in Halls of Infusion on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Curious Swoglets devoured by the Gulping Goliath while Hangry

subtree.name: Go With the Flow
subtree.desc: Defeat the Primal Tsunami after slaying three Flow Control Units in Halls of Infusion on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: Knowledge is... Preserved?
subtree.desc: Defeat Chargath, Bane of Scales while burning less than 15 books in Neltharus on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Allow no more than 15 books to catch fire

subtree.name: Ready for Raiding VIII
subtree.desc: Defeat Forgemaster Gorek without being struck by Forgestorm, Forgefire, Blazing Eruptions, another player's Blazing Aegis, or the final slam of Heated Swings in Neltharus on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Avoid being struck by Forgestorm, Forgefire, Blazing Eruptions, another player's Blazing Aegis, or the final slam of Heated Swings.

subtree.name: Liquid Hot Magma
subtree.desc: Defeat Magmatusk after it has been mutated with Draconic Tincture in Neltharus on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: Are You My Broodmother?
subtree.desc: Defeat Kyrakka and Erkhart Stormvein after chilling, searing, tempering, and keeping alive the Nascent Ruby Egg in Ruby Life Pools on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Chill, Sear, Temper, and Keep Alive the Nascent Ruby Egg

subtree.name: Dragon Kill Points
subtree.desc: Defeat Melidrussa after defeating 40 of her chamber's Infused Whelps in Ruby Life Pools on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Defeat 40 Infused Whelps from Melidrussa's chamber

subtree.name: Does Steam Do Fire Damage?
subtree.desc: Defeat Kokia Blazehoof after heating up 4 life pools with Molten Boulder in Ruby Life Pools on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: You Must Be Made of Hide
criteria.achievement_name: You Must Be Made of Hide

subtree.name: You Must Be Made of Hide
subtree.desc: Defeat Umbrelskul without being hit by a polymorph trap or triggering a Shriek in The Azure Vault on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Avoid being hit by polymorph traps and ensure Shriek is never cast

subtree.name: Icy What You Did There
subtree.desc: Defeat Telash Greywing after using Icy Devastator 12 times on an Icy Crystal to create a Very Icy Crystal in The Azure Vault on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: The Cracked Crystal
subtree.desc: Defeat Umbrelskul after smashing Shimmering Geodes with Dragon Strike and destroying 9 Geode Chunks in The Azure Vault on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: What Are The Chances...
subtree.desc: Defeat the Raging Tempest after striking a single player with 5 Lightning Strikes simultaneously and defeating a Storm Elemental in The Nokhud Offensive on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: Weapons of the Maruukai
subtree.desc: Defeat Teera and Maruuk while holding the Spear of Tolui, War Axe of Berke, and Bow of Sartaq in The Nokhud Offensive on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: Ohuna Incubation
subtree.desc: Deliver eight warm ohuna eggs to Ohuna Keeper Taruk in a single visit to The Nokhud Offensive on Mythic difficulty.

subtree.name: Nokhud Deed Goes Unnoticed
subtree.desc: Defeat Balakar Khan after healing Ohn'ahra to full health in The Nokhud Offensive on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: It's a Trogg Eat Trogg World
criteria.achievement_name: It's a Trogg Eat Trogg World

subtree.name: It's a Trogg Eat Trogg World
subtree.desc: Defeat Bromach while 10 or more Stonevault Troggs are still alive in Uldaman: Legacy of Tyr on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Defeat Bromach with 10 or more living Stonevault Troggs

subtree.name: No, You're Stunning!
subtree.desc: Defeat Sentinel Talondras after simultaneously stunning both Sentinel Talondras and all party members in Uldaman: Legacy of Tyr on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Stun Sentinel Talondras and the entire party at the same time

subtree.name: Like Sands Through the Hourglass
subtree.desc: Defeat Chrono-Lord Deios after catching 20 Eternity Orbs as they fall to the ground in Uldaman: Legacy of Tyr on Mythic difficulty.

criteria.criteria_name: Catch 20 Eternity Orbs as they fall to the ground

data.name: An Ancient Awakening
data.desc: Unlock the Ancient Waygate travel network in the Dragon Isles.

data.name: Against the Elements
data.desc: Defeat each of the elemental lords during the Dragonflight pre-launch events.

data.name: Soupervisor
data.desc: Complete 100 tasks at the Community Feast in Iskaara.

data.name: Waking Shores: Silver
data.desc: Obtain silver in all normal races in the Waking Shores.

data.desc: Armed Azeroth's heroes as a Weaponsmith during war efforts prior to the Cataclysm.

data.desc: Equipped Azeroth's heroes as an Armorsmith during war efforts prior to the Cataclysm.

data.desc: Equipped Azeroth's heroes as a specialized Leatherworker during war efforts prior to the Cataclysm.

data.desc: Equipped Azeroth's heroes as a specialized Tailor during war efforts prior to the Cataclysm.

data.name: Caverns of Infusion
data.desc: Defeat the following bosses in the cavernous depths of Vault of the Incarnates.

data.name: Mythic: Algeth'ar Academy Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Echo of Doragosa in Algeth'ar Academy on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: Mythic: Brackenhide Hollow Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Decatriarch Wratheye in Brackenhide Hollow on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: Mythic: Halls of Infusion Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Primal Tsunami in Halls of Infusion on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: Mythic: Neltharus Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Warlord Sargha in Neltharus on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: Mythic: Ruby Life Pools Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Kyrakka and Erkhart Stormvein in Ruby Life Pools on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: Mythic: The Azure Vault Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Umbrelskul in The Azure Vault on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: Mythic: The Nokhud Offensive Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Balakar Khan in The Nokhud Offensive on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: Mythic: Uldaman: Legacy of Tyr Guild Run
data.desc: Defeat Chrono-Lord Deios in Uldaman: Legacy of Tyr on Mythic difficulty while in a guild group.

data.name: You Know How to Reach Me
data.desc: Complete all of the Forbidden Reach achievements listed below.

subtree.name: Explore the Forbidden Reach
subtree.desc: Explore the post-storm Forbidden Reach, revealing the covered areas of the world map.

subtree.name: Treasures of the Forbidden Reach
subtree.desc: Discover the hidden treasures within the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

subtree.name: Hoarder of the Forbidden Reach
subtree.desc: Open 100 small treasures around the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

subtree.name: Champion of the Forbidden Reach
subtree.desc: Complete all of the following special encounters in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

subtree.name: Forbidden Spoils
subtree.desc: Open 10 Forbidden Hoards around the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

subtree.name: Librarian of the Reach
subtree.desc: Collect each of the following books found in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

criteria.criteria_name: The Old Gods and the Ordering of Azeroth (Annotated)

subtree.name: Scroll Hunter
subtree.desc: Find treasures from 50 Sealed Scroll maps in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

subtree.name: Under the Weather
subtree.desc: Complete a Froststone Vault Primal Storm of every element.

subtree.name: Door Buster
subtree.desc: Unlock 150 doors within the Zskera Vaults using Zskera Vault Keys.

subtree.name: Every Door, Everywhere, All At Once
subtree.desc: Unlock every door in a single Zskera Vault within one week.

subtree.name: While We Were Sleeping
subtree.desc: Deliver the following items to the Scalecommanders at the Forbidden Reach.

data.name: Battle on the Dragon Isles II
data.desc: Complete 8 Pet Battle World Quests on the Dragon Isles with a full team of level 25 pets.

data.name: Toolbox Trouble
data.desc: Owner of the Volatile Self-Driving Toolbox pet from the Recruit a Friend promotion.

data.name: Still Standing in the Fire
data.desc: Get killed by Fyrakk.

data.name: Azj-Kahet
data.desc: Complete the following storylines in Azj-Kahet.

data.name: Stones Can't Fly!
data.desc: Earn 2000 Flightstones.

data.name: Trading Post: Dragonflight
data.desc: Owner of any Dragonflight edition before the month of November 2023.

data.name: Warcraft Rumble Minis, Sneed's Newer Look
data.desc: Upgrade Sneed twice.

data.name: Warcraft Rumble Minis, Huntress' New Look
data.desc: Upgrade The Night Elf Huntress once.

data.name: Warcraft Rumble Minis, Tauren's Newer Look
data.desc: Upgrade the Stonehoof Tauren twice.

data.name: Warcraft Rumble Minis, Murloc's New Look
data.desc: Upgrade the Murloc once.

data.name: Adventurer of the Forbidden Reach
data.desc: Complete 10 of the following special encounters in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

data.name: Scavenger of the Forbidden Reach
data.desc: Open 20 small treasures around the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

data.name: Heroic Edition: Tangled Dreamweaver
data.desc: Owner of the Dragonflight Heroic Edition Tangled Dreamweaver mount.

data.name: A New Beginning
data.desc: Complete the Old Hatreds storyline in the Ohn'ahran Plains.

data.name: X Marks the Spot
data.desc: Find treasures from 10 Sealed Scroll maps in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

data.name: Craftsman of the Argent Dawn
data.desc: Aided in the Argent Dawn's assault against Naxxramas with your crafting skills prior to the expedition on Northrend.

data.name: Deep Cuts From the Vault
data.desc: Complete one of the achievements or feats of strength listed below.

data.name: Reverse Racer: Bronze
data.desc: Complete all reverse races in the Dragon Isles.

data.name: Mythic: Darkflame Cleft
data.desc: Defeat The Darkness in Darkflame Cleft on Mythic or Mythic Keystone difficulty.

data.name: Battle Mender: The War Within Season 1
data.desc: Win 50 Solo Shuffle rounds as a Healer at or above Rival I during The War Within Season 1.

data.name: Airborne Tumbler
data.desc: Use Whirling Surge to dismount an enemy player in War Mode.

data.name: Back En-masse
data.desc: Defeat Tyr, the Infinite Keeper after closing 18 Time Rifts in Dawn of the Infinite on Mythic difficulty.

data.name: Of the Tyr's Guard
data.desc: Complete Tyr's storyline in the Dragon Isles.

data.name: Cosplate
data.desc: Defeat Kazzara, the Hellforged after shattering your own Hellsteel Plating in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: Fruit of the Bloom
data.desc: Acquire every Superbloom Dreamfruit power at least once.

data.name: Super Duper Bloom
data.desc: Complete a Superbloom at epic bloom quality.

data.name: Bloom Man Group
data.desc: During the Superbloom, use the Feral Overflow power to summon a powerful Feral Umbraclaw 10 times.

data.name: Dream Chaser
data.desc: Gather 100 errant Dreams during the Superbloom.

data.name: Chromatic Calibration: Holo-Gogs
data.desc: Craft each of the following goggles listed below.

data.name: Uncertified Nurse
data.desc: Create 500 Wildercloth Bandages.

data.name: Ton of Tops
data.desc: Craft each of the following shirts, and a pair of Tuxedo Pants, with the Tailoring profession.

data.name: Iron to Vendor Gold
data.desc: Craft each of the following Philosopher's Stones.

data.name: Chromatic Calibration: Retinal Armor
data.desc: Craft each of the following goggles listed below.

data.name: Chromatic Calibration: Cranial Cannons
data.desc: Craft each of the following goggles listed below.

data.name: Chromatic Calibration: Ectoplasmic Specs
data.desc: Craft each of the following goggles listed below.

data.name: Chromatic Calibration: Bio-Optic Killshades
data.desc: Craft each of the following goggles listed below.

data.name: Fantastic Figurines
data.desc: Craft or repair each of the figurines listed below.

data.name: Memory of Scholomance
data.desc: Perform a ritual with Eva's Journal.

data.name: WoW's 19th Anniversary
data.desc: Logged in during WoW's 19th Anniversary.

data.name: Seeing Red
data.desc: Witness Velen's prophecy of unexpected penitence unfold.

data.name: Cooling the Research Field
data.desc: Complete the following achievements during the Researchers Under Fire event located in Zaralek Cavern.

subtree.name: Nothing Stops the Research
subtree.desc: Defeat the Sundered Flame leader Captain Reykal during either of the Researchers Under Fire events.

subtree.name: Lockdown Mystery
subtree.desc: Defeat the Contaminated Titan Watcher during the Researchers Under Fire: Titan Lockdown event.

subtree.name: Research Mishap
subtree.desc: Defeat the Monstrous Magmaclaw Snapper during the Researchers Under Fire: Zaqali Ruin Investigation event.

subtree.name: Rockin Research
subtree.desc: Destroy 100 boulders during the Researchers Under Fire: Titan Lockdown event.

subtree.name: A Research Sampler
subtree.desc: Gather 50 Curious Ore Samples during the Researchers Under Fire: Titan Lockdown event.

criteria.criteria_name: A Pillar of the Research Community
criteria.achievement_name: A Pillar of the Research Community

subtree.name: A Pillar of the Research Community
subtree.desc: Restore 25 Djaradin Pillar Shards during the Researchers Under Fire: Zaqali Ruin Investigation event.

subtree.name: A Djaradin Puzzle
subtree.desc: Restore 25 Resilient Stones to the Zaqali altar during the Researchers Under Fire: Zaqali Ruin Investigation event.

subtree.name: Hot Research Zone
subtree.desc: Kill 500 hostile creatures during either of the Researchers Under Fire events.

subtree.name: The Small Disruptions
subtree.desc: Stomp on 100 Magmaclaw Snappers during the Researchers Under Fire: Zaqali Ruin Investigation event.

data.name: Two Warband Mentors: The War Within
data.desc: Reach level 80 with two characters.

data.name: Dream Shaper
data.desc: Complete the quest "Shaping the Dreamsurge".

data.name: Through the Ashes and Flames
data.desc: Complete the quest "Suffusion Camp".

data.name: Never Bothered, Anyway
data.desc: Collect the Sapphiron's Bane crafted set for any armor type.

data.name: Vaulternative Fashion
data.desc: Collect an armor set from Vault of the Incarnates.

data.name: Leaders of Scholomance
data.desc: Defeat the following bosses within Scholomance.

data.name: Eastern Kingdoms: Bronze
data.desc: Complete all races in Eastern Kingdoms.

data.name: Glory of the Aberrus Raider
data.desc: Complete the Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible raid achievements listed below.

subtree.name: I'll Make My Own Shadowflame
subtree.desc: Defeat the Shadowflame Amalgamation after using Umbral Detonation, Fiery Meteor and Blistering Twilight on a Forgotten Specimen Tank to create and extinguish a Shadowflame Remnant in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Tabula Rasa
subtree.desc: Defeat The Forgotten Experiments after Nutraal is hit 3 times by Rending Charge, Volatile Spew, and Deep Breath in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Are You Even Trying?
subtree.desc: Defeat the Assault of the Zaqali after hitting the following creatures with a Cave Pebble in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Whac-A-Swog
subtree.desc: Defeat Rashok, the Elder after hitting the Lost Lunker with Searing Slam 5 times in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

criteria.criteria_name: Hit the Lost Lunker with Searing Slam 5 times.

subtree.name: Eggscellent Eggsecution
subtree.desc: Defeat The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn while a member of your raid is carrying the Delicate Experimental Egg in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

criteria.criteria_name: Defeat The Vigilant Steward, Zskarn while a member of your raid is carrying the Delicate Experimental Egg

subtree.name: Objects in Transit May Shatter
subtree.desc: Defeat the Echo of Neltharion after players smash through walls of Twisted Earth while carrying the Expired Experiment, the Stack of Scrolls, the Neverburning Ebon Candle, and the "Portable" Ebon Anvil in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

criteria.criteria_name: Shatter the Expired Experiment, Stack of Scrolls, Neverburning Ebon Candle, and "Portable" Ebon Anvil.
We'll Never See That Again, Surely
criteria.achievement_name: We'll Never See That Again, Surely

subtree.name: We'll Never See That Again, Surely
subtree.desc: Defeat Scalecommander Sarkareth after cultivating a Lump of Flesh and hurling it into the Emptiness Between Stars in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

criteria.criteria_name: Hurl a Lump of Flesh into the Emptiness Between Stars.

data.name: Ahead of the Curve: Scalecommander Sarkareth
data.desc: Defeat Scalecommander Sarkareth in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Heroic difficulty or higher, before the release of the next raid tier.

data.name: Cutting Edge: Scalecommander Sarkareth
data.desc: Defeat  Scalecommander Sarkareth in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Mythic difficulty, before the release of the next raid tier.

data.name: Burst Damage
data.desc: Consume a Potion of Bursting Blood while under the simultaneous effects of Blossom Burst, Glory Burst, Marrow Burst, Torch Burst, and Widow Burst.

data.name: Escar-Go-Go-Go
data.desc: Defeat Magmorax after feeding him 20 Spicy Lava Snails in Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: Portal to Everywhere
data.desc: Collect each of the following devices that allow for intradimensional travel.

data.name: Just an Ordinary Gas Cloud
data.desc: Extract elements from 50 gas clouds with the Zapthrottle Mote Extractor.

data.name: That's No Ordinary Gas Cloud!
data.desc: Encage 2 of each elemental soul with the Zapthrottle Soul Inhaler.

data.name: Forge and Befuddle
data.desc: Deliver Forged Documents to the following gullible individuals.

data.name: Forge and Befuddle
data.desc: Deliver Forged Documents to the following gullible individuals.

data.name: Haven't We Done This Before?
data.desc: Defeat Smolderon after dousing all 6 Runes of the Firelord in Amirdrassil, the Dream's Hope on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: Dragonflight Keystone Explorer: Season Three
data.desc: Attain a Mythic+ Rating of at least 750 during Dragonflight Season Three.

data.name: Dragonflight Keystone Conqueror: Season Three
data.desc: Attain a Mythic+ Rating of at least 1500 during Dragonflight Season Three.

data.name: Dragonflight Keystone Master: Season Three
data.desc: Attain a Mythic+ Rating of at least 2000 during Dragonflight Season Three.

data.name: So Much Sharing
data.desc: Buy five Warband Bank tabs.

data.name: Darkflame Cleft
data.desc: Defeat The Darkness in Darkflame Cleft.

data.name: Heroic: Darkflame Cleft
data.desc: Defeat The Darkness in Darkflame Cleft on Heroic difficulty or higher.

data.name: Dragonflight Keystone Hero: Season Three
data.desc: Attain a Mythic+ Rating of at least 2500 during Dragonflight Season Three.

data.name: Adventurer of the Emerald Dream
data.desc: Complete 10 of the following special encounters in the Emerald Dream.

data.name: Ysergle The Dreamurk
data.desc: Owner of the Ysergle pet.

data.name: Eastern Kingdoms Reverse: Bronze
data.desc: Complete all reverse races in Eastern Kingdoms.

data.name: Battleground Blitz Veteran
data.desc: Complete 50 victories in Battleground Blitz.

data.name: Learning the Ropes
data.desc: Participate in 25 matches in Battleground Blitz.

data.name: Brawlroom Blitzer
data.desc: Participate in 50 matches in Battleground Blitz.

data.name: Battle-scarred Battler
data.desc: Participate in 100 matches in Battleground Blitz.

data.name: The War Within Season 2: Master Blaster
data.desc: Accomplished one of the following feats during Season Two of The War Within on your current character:

criteria.criteria_name: Defeated Gallywix on Heroic or Mythic difficulty

data.name: I Only Need One Trip
data.desc: Deposit all 10 ore at once in the "Courier Mission: Ore Recovery" world quest.

data.name: For the Collective
data.desc: Contribute a total of 100 ore toward activating helpful contraptions for your fellow players during the "Courier Mission: Ore Recovery" world quest.

criteria.criteria_name: Contribute 100 ore to any contraptions during "Courier Mission: Ore Recovery" world quest

data.name: A Timewalking Journey Back to a Classic Dungeon Time
data.desc: Complete at least six of the following Classic Timewalking dungeons.

data.name: You Can't See Me
data.desc: Defeat The Bloodbound Horror after all players are Slimed! and then defeat a Volatile Ooze in Nerub-ar Palace on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: Slimy Yet Satisfying
data.desc: Defeat Ulgrax the Devourer while keeping the Spider Silk Grub alive in Nerub-ar Palace on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: Cowabunga
data.desc: Defeat Rasha'nan after all players ride a single wave per cast of Rolling Acid in Nerub-ar Palace on Normal difficulty or higher.

criteria.criteria_name: All players surf each Rolling Acid cast once

data.name: Would You Still /love Me if I Was a Worm...
data.desc: Defeat Broodtwister Ovi'nax after everyone proves their /love to a Disheartened Worm in Nerub-ar Palace on Normal difficulty or higher.

criteria.criteria_name: Prove your /love to a Disheartened Worm.

data.name: Kill Streak
data.desc: Defeat Nexus-Princess Ky'veza while she has an active Kill Streak in Nerub-ar Palace on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: Missed 'Em by That Much
data.desc: Defeat Queen Ansurek after all players use Abyssal Conduits to travel underneath her during Frothing Gluttony in Nerub-ar Palace on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: Adventurer of The Ringing Deeps
data.desc: Complete 10 of the following special encounters across The Ringing Deeps.

data.name: Allied Races: Earthen
data.desc: Complete the War Within storylines listed below.

data.name: Heritage of the Earthen
data.desc: Earn level 50 on a newly created earthen character.

data.name: Notable Machines
data.desc: Read the following Notes On Machine Speakers in The Ringing Deeps.

criteria.criteria_name: Notes On The Machine Speakers: Fragment I
Notes On The Machine Speakers: Fragment II
Notes On The Machine Speakers: Fragment III
Notes On The Machine Speakers: Fragment IV
Notes On The Machine Speakers: Fragment V
Notes On The Machine Speakers: Fragment VI

data.name: No Harm Ever Came From Reading A Book
data.desc: Return the evil copies of yourself back to the book after following the spiders in Pillar-nest Xesh.

data.name: The Unseeming
data.desc: Acquire 100 stacks of Unseeming Shift in the Maddening Deep or the Writhing Fields.

data.name: You Can't Hang With Us
data.desc: Be expunged from the City of Threads by guards.

data.name: Ready to Turn
data.desc: Open a Bountiful Coffer with a Restored Coffer Key.

data.name: Raisin' Brann
data.desc: Revive Brann Bronzebeard after he has fallen unconscious.

data.name: Super Size Snuffling
data.desc: Obtain 100 Odd Glob of Wax

data.name: Copious Coffers
data.desc: Open 250 Bountiful Coffers with Restored Coffer Keys.

data.name: The Key to Madness
data.desc: Open 500 Bountiful Coffers with Restored Coffer Keys.

data.name: Sik Parry Bro
data.desc: Defeat Sikran after all players are affected by Riposte in Nerub-ar Palace on Normal difficulty or higher.

data.name: War Within Delves: Tier 1
data.desc: Complete a Tier 1 delve.

data.name: Branntastic
data.desc: Obtain all curios that are available for Brann Bronzebeard at rank 4.

data.name: Sojourner of Undermine
data.desc: Complete the optional Undermine storylines listed below.

data.name: A Farewell to Arms
data.desc: Put an end to the Battle for Azeroth by completing the following achievements.

subtree.name: Uldir
subtree.desc: Defeat the bosses of Uldir on Normal difficulty or higher.

subtree.name: Battle of Dazar'alor
subtree.desc: Defeat the Bosses of Battle of Dazar'alot on Normal difficulty or higher.
